files.title: The Anchoring Advantage Method
files.script: Why the first number said in any negotiation determines your final salary. Master psychological anchoring to increase your salary offers by 15-25% before you even start negotiating. Here's what you need to know: Research shows the first number mentioned influences the entire negotiation range by up to 40%. Use the "Range Plus" technique: State your target as the bottom of a 20% range. Always anchor higher than your actual goal - negotiators typically settle 10-15% below the opening anchor. Want the full framework? Link in bio. DM me 'DAY11' for the password. Let's level up together!

files.title: The STAR-Impact Framework
files.script: Transform boring interview answers into compelling stories that land job offers. Use this upgraded storytelling method to stand out from 90% of candidates who give generic, forgettable responses. Here's what you need to know: Traditional STAR method lacks the business impact that hiring managers actually care about. Quantify your results with specific metrics - revenue, time saved, efficiency gained, or problems solved. End every story with a forward-looking statement connecting your past success to their future needs. Want the full framework? Link in bio. DM me 'DAY12' for the password. Let's level up together!

files.title: Executive Presence Blueprint
files.script: The invisible factor blocking 78% of professionals from senior promotions. Develop the leadership gravitas that opens doors to C-suite opportunities and $200K+ roles. Here's what you need to know: Executive presence is 67% about how you communicate, not what you know or accomplish. Master the "Power Triangle": confident body language, strategic speaking patterns, and decisive decision-making. Practice the "Executive Edit" - eliminate filler words, apologetic language, and permission-seeking phrases. Want the full framework? Link in bio. DM me 'DAY13' for the password. Let's level up together!
